import React from 'react'; import {Card,CardContent,Typography,Grid, StylesProvider, withStyles} from '@material-ui/core'; import styles from './Cards.module.css'; const Cards = ({data : {confirmed,recovered,deaths}}) => { if(!confirmed) { return "Loading..."; } return (
Infected {confirmed.value} REAL DATE No. of active cases Recovered REAL DATA REAL DATE No. of recoveries Deaths REAL DATA REAL DATE No. of deaths
); } export default Cards;
